original_text: Thus did the people of Israel; they did according to all that the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그대로 행하되 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: Thus did the people of Israel
they did according to all that the Lord commanded Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주께서 모세에게 명하신 모든 것대로 행하였다
